message: Bob, I'm confident this product is worth a significant investment for you. I'm offering it to you at $1,000,000.  I believe this price reflects the value it will bring to your business, while still allowing for a profitable return for me.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While $900,000 is closer to what I'm looking for, I'm still hoping for a price closer to $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950,000.  This price acknowledges your budget constraints while still allowing me a fair return on my investment.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $900,000. I'm willing to meet you at $925,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
